name: Ritz L
text: The scene is a hippie, far-out man kind of place and the service was good but a bit slow. The spinach dip was good and the pizza was good also but one small and 2 medium pizzas and some dip and 2 beers for almost $100 bucks? Hmm...you ‚Ä¶More

name: Kim Davis
text: Got home and my pizza was completely incorrect. The receipt was correct but inside was different. All my kids wanted was pizza and they did not end up getting it

name: KT
text:
Pretty wonderful place to eat pizza, and pizza related things. Has a huge selection of beers and drinks.
Waiters and staff are always very nice but the drinks from the bar always take a ‚Ä¶More

name: Francisco Zavala
text: Paper straws? A first for me, sweet tea FTW! Music is at a perfect level to eat and socialize with friends. Can‚Äôt complain about the food, it was delicious  üòç Sarah was excellent!!!

name: Keith Kandrack
text: That‚Äôs one star more than it deserves because of Covid. Over an hour wait for a pizza that still was not at our table. Ended up canceling the order - good beer selection

name: Chris Kosiba
text: We ordered over 100 dollars worth of pizza and wings, and it came later than we expected, but Reed reached out and remedied the situation which is all you can ask for. Things happen, especially when it's busy, but these are people who stand by their work. I will be back.

name: Ronald Resseguie
text: Great place, great food and great service. Keep up the good work, we will be back!

name: Katrina Tripp
text: Man I loved the soup but alot of menu Iran's are gone and just not enough mushroom stuff

name: steve smith
text: Say goodbye to a regular. I come here all the time. I‚Äôve came here 3 times just this week. No issues until tonight when I come to pick up my online order I walk in and one of the lady‚Äôs is talking with no mask in a huddled group and then ‚Ä¶More

name: Cordelia Starnes
text: This place is great! This inside is so artistic and psychedelic! The food is delicious as well! They even have vegan options!!

name: Monica Thomas
text: This place is awesome!! Food was delicious and the service was outstanding!

name: Grey Hatcher
text: Service/food is worse than it used to be.    Had rude wait staff at lunch.   Wrong order was brought, then we were over charged.   Pizza was under cooked (first time this had happened).  I‚Äôll update the review if things are better next time.  Regardless has clean bathrooms and a good vibe.

name: Asa Holloway
text: Caroline did a great job excellent customer service. prompt service and really good pizza

name: Fresh Fraz
text: Mellow mushroom one of my favorite pizza joints around the young lady‚Äôs that work there customer service was excellent and friendly

name: Dominique Costner
text: This is the best location.  The pizza takes a little while but it is so worth the wait.  The sandwiches are delicious.  Love the atmosphere inside and out. A great place to bring my vegan friends.

name: Betsy Brisendine
text: Considering it was 1st time open for dine-in since mid-March, it was good. The food took forever to arrive to hungry patrons kindly wearing masks, it was delish! Wait staff came by a few times, yet there were some large gaps of time it felt we were forgotten about.

name: Eliza
text: We love this Mellow Mushroom!! We come often and the staff are always very friendly. The restaurant itself has a very laid back atmosphere. Our waitress, Monica, was amazing! She is the very best-she is friendly, attentive, and always gets the orders perfect for us. We would definitely recommend this place to anyone!

name: paracxsm
text: I loved the aesthetic, the service was great, and the food was delicious. I would go again :)

name: Luis Mart
text: To go orders are consistently late. Probably because they have little kids working in there who pay no attention to service. Order took over an hour because they literally ‚Äúforgot to add it to queue‚Äù. Never again!

name: Emma‚Äôs Plate
text: This is the best pizza I‚Äôve had. The pizzas are so unique and delicious. Would absolutely recommend.

name: Brian Wilson
text: Excellent food.  Great gluten free pizza. Excellent service.

name: Matt Hotelling
text: Great pizza, with a great beer cheese appetizer. Broad selection of beers. Great service and cleanly environment.

name: Strother Hite-Jett
text: Disappointed....we ordered two Country Club sandwiches and there was only one slice of turkey, a slice of cheese, a slice of advocado and bacon "jam"...not even sure what that was. ‚Ä¶More

name: Marissa G.
text: Mellow mushroom has bomb pizzas, and I love that they have vegan options. I would recommend them to anyone! I did have an experience where they gave me the wrong pizza and it took a while to receive a proper refund and deal with the situation but in response to this review, it‚Äôs been taken care of.

name: Abby Selouani
text: Went there last night for the first time. March 14. The waitress forgot my mans pizza, had to wait 20 extra minutes to get it. Half way through my calzone, I started feeling so sick, like I wanna throw up. From last night about an hour ‚Ä¶More

name: Tanya
text: Great experience at this location. I love the restaurant itself and the chain, this location is super cute for a date night outside and the food was great as always! 10/10 recommend!

name: Oscar Peterson
text: Such a great experience overall! Our waitress was phenomenal and honestly, it was the best service we've had in a very long time. I'm vegan but my husband is not and she made the process of selecting vegan options so easy! The vegan pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Chandler Bakers
text: Got home after a long day and went to eat my food and noticed the bottom of my pizza was completely burned

name: Shaked Bar-Tal
text: Beautiful Park just 5 minutes drive from Manhattan. I highly recommend visiting this park.

name: jonnydripdrop 5
text: So your online ordering isn't available and no one picks up the phone.... How are y'all even open?

name: Water Jelly
text: I love this place.  It has good service, and friendly staff.  I'd recommend the Pretzel Bites for an appetizer, and the Funky Q pizza for an entree.

name: Reagan Phillips
text: Love this location. Large and clean and the staff is super friendly. The food is always great. I've been on several occasions at different times of day and night bit service is always very slow! If the service was faster this would be a ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Foguth
text: I haven't been to a mellow mushroom in years, and I was very pleasantly surprised.  We got three small pizzas with the Tuesday special.  All three were quite good.  The crust and the sauce were done well.  The best part was the bacon topping.  It was crunchy and delicious, unlike fast food bacon toppings.  I'll be going again.

name: Michelle Tomei
text: Well the Magic Mushroom soup is amazing, the curry chicken salad sandwich not so much,  the bread should of been toasted to add a little crunch, so much curry mayo hardly any pecans or cherries....... the bartender was not very attentive, ‚Ä¶More

name: David Albertson
text: Pizza is made with great ingredients if you've never tried Mellow Mushroom you're missing out..

name: allen webb
text: The food was fantastic, the service was perfect (not too slow or too insistent/persistent), and the food was brought out at the perfect time.

name: Noah Cruzan
text: Pizza good as always but staff is lazy, rude and incompetent.  Stay away.  UPDATE; our waitress was nice so changing from 1 star to 4 star.

name: Jarrod Fraley
text: Pizza is correctly made half of the time. It takes too long for us to sit around and hope someone reads the ticket correctly. We wasted our Monday night waiting for them to get the pizza right for the third time. The manager did everything ‚Ä¶More

name: Rhonda Bowman
text: I've never been there.  Pizza was awesome.  The only thing I noticed is the food was cold.

name: William Turner
text: The pizza, when baked correctly, can be amazing. Unfortunately this location consistently falls short. The past three times I‚Äôve been to this location, my experience has been bad. ‚Ä¶More

name: Maximiliano Calder√≥n
text: Amazing place, nice pizza and beers!

name: Moe Kormod
text: Service was trash, food came out in the wrong order.  Waited 10 mins to get a refill of our drinks

name: Helmer Naranjo
text: This place is amazing, service was excellent, the manager, Mr. David, was looking after us all the time, we had such a great time and food was delicious! Appetizers, pizza, beer and wine were so good!

name: Brandon
text: Amazing food. Friendly people. Everybody can eat something here. 10/10 would recommend

name: Tamika Miles
text: Excellent food. Great service. Family friendly environment.

name: Kiesha Clay
text: Chloe is an amazingly kind, extremely sweet, awesome conversationalist and a hellava bartender. We also had the pleasure of meeting the GM Reid who came to check on us. We also had a wonderful conversation.I found that quite wonderful. The food was Ahhhhmazing OMG So delicious. Go check em out....you won't regret it!

name: Justin Eggleton
text: Consistently slow but that‚Äôs part of the fun. Service is pretty good but it‚Äôs all about the pizza.

name: Brendan Varley
text: Imagine eating pizza inside a classic Jimi Hendrix poster, complete with a gigantic mushroom that acts as an indoor canopy, and flying carpets on the ceiling. Excellent atmosphere for pizza, and honestly, unique among pizza joints. Quieter ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Fernandez
text: Fun place and cool vibe. Kids like the kid's meal sizes. Queso pretzel bites are a must. Kids size pizza is also pretty good.

name: Michael Nickisch
text: Great place. Unique. Laid back. Great service! Games on TV. Balloon animals for kids. A little bit spendy drinks but the food prices are ok. Loved it. Will be back.

name: Drew Bee
text: I loved the food.  I loved the personalities in the severs.  The decor was a bit lacking, though.  I didn't think that it was the full mellow mushroom experience.  You really need the funky decorations, but it is understandable.  You might ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott C
text: Came in yesterday around 7 and the place was half full. Only a few people at the bar. It took a while for the bartender to give me a menu and take my drink order because she was also waiting tables. Bartender was working her butt off so I ‚Ä¶More

name: Michele York
text: Delicious food, service was okay,  prices were a bit high.

name: Arturo Montenora
text: Had the murshoom pizza, it was delicious,  it's a cool place to check out

name: Mark Orchard
text:
Awesome pizzas but is a tad bit pricey. Definitely delicious though.
Edit: After a response from the owner, and no way to communicate back, I must add that, yes, it is pricey and absolutely worth it. I'm from MD and was on ‚Ä¶More

name: Daniel Branham
text: This is a pretty standard Mellow Mushroom. The pizza was great and so was the service. The  atmosphere at this one wasn't quite as exciting as other Mellow Mushrooms

name: Melissa Lanyi
text: Our food was absolutely horrible. Visited on a Thursday night and the place was not busy at all. I ordered the chicken club and it came out freezing cold. If that is the way it is supposed to be served then fine, but it was not good. I was ‚Ä¶More

name: John Rueckel
text: Decent pizza, good mushrooms. The mushroom soup was okay, but more like cheese soup with a mushroom garnish.

name: Candice Miller
text: There pizza is amazing! Its very fresh and the slices are hugh! Well worth the drive, parking can be tricky but we park in the deck to walk off the extra calories.

name: Catherine Robinson
text: OMG!!!! The best service I  have had. We sat at the bar and our waitress was one of a kind!!! She was the nicest person EVER!!!! The food was excellent!!! I ordered the Cheesesteak and my son ordered Chicken wings and pizza YUMMY!!!!I can't remember her name but I did mention to the manager how Awesome she was.

name: Barb Callahan
text: First the pizza there is amazing. We were there on a Sunday afternoon and it didn't  look to be busy, steady maybe but not overly busy. The only time we saw our waitress was when we placed our order and then to pay our bill. One of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Cluck
text: The food is delicious, healthy alternatives and service is friendly, plus interactive displays for menus and other entertainment.

name: Nathan Messer
text: Took over 45 to get our food. Waitress never checked on us unless she was dropping food or check off. Drinks stayed empty for 20 min. Food was good.

name: Chelsea Lowe
text: The food is great, however we received our appetizer the same time we received our main course. Once we received our food, the waitress disappeared for a little while so we weren't able to ask for refills or the ranch we ordered with our meal. For pizza it is a little pricey but like I said the food is great.

name: Justin Kennedy
text: Ordered a little Greek salad with some modifiers, came out perfect. The avocado and veggies were the freshest I‚Äôve seen in a while.

name: Jennifer Thompson
text: Delicious food, great and attentive service

name: Chris Williams
text: The Vegan pizza was great!!

name: judy gessner
text: I don't usually have much to say about pizza, but this was far better than the usual pizza joint. Our server, Zoey, went sbive and beyond to make this an enjoyable meal.  The holy shitake pie was excellent--even in gluten free version.   And the magic mushroom soup was magical!

name: michele williams
text: This is our go to restaurant after a movie. I love the tempeh hoagie, but the pizza is delicious as well.

name: Garrett Krause
text: Good food, good atmosphere, and a great beer selection.  Can't ever go wrong with Mellow Mushroom!

name: Dikolai
text: Mellow Mushroom always has some of the best pizza. Top 5 I've ever had. Don't ask me to list them

name: Jake Jacobs
text: This is probably the nicest of the Charlotte area locations. Lots of space and plenty to do nearby. Grood drink specials. Good pizza. Had my usual, Kosmic Karma. Pretty good, crusts slightly overcooked. I probably wouldn't have served it, ‚Ä¶More

name: Adam Wood
text: Great pizza selections, there are sauce based and pesto based pizza. The service is very down to earth, the music is great and the d√©cor is top notch. When you walk in you see some pretty elaborate trippy artwork. There is also a second ‚Ä¶More

name: Rylee
text: Friendly staff, great food. The prices are good as well.

name: Amaro Innovations
text:
The food was excellent. Got a couple appetizers and they were both very good and came out fast.
The service was great also and the waiter was very attentive, helpful and very ‚Ä¶More

name: Erik Wind
text: Servers knew their menu inside out. Great salad, pizza and beer choices, and everything came out great. They even had the salad and pizza come out at separate times at a good pace. 5.5 stars because they had a balloon maker for the kids.

name: cory hyman
text: If the atmosphere here doesn't mellow you out, the pizza definitely will. My daughter asked me why I was eating with eyes closed and it's because I wanted to savor the flavor of true gourmet pizza! Fresh ingredients, rad surroundings and being able to play Tetris on a tabletop arcade get all my stars.

name: S. Renee Heath
text: I don't usually give one star but if I could I would give this place 0 stars. My family went here to eat. The hostess asked us to wait, fine right? Well there were some napkins ON THE FLOOR. She picked them up and wiped the table with them ‚Ä¶More

name: Dave M
text: Food is good but the staff are what really make this place. They are so friendly and really great with our autistic daughter. A really great place to bring the family.

name: Annmarie Kreischer
text: Disappointed in our visit. I ordered a Mixed Green Build Your Own salad. I received an ALL iceberg salad, I told the waitress (who was nice) and she came back (whispered in my ear we have new kitchen staff) and places a salad in front of me ‚Ä¶More

name: Sara Dagler
text: Disappointed. Got home and both of my pizzas or burnt on the bottom. Called back and the hostess said sorry but really meant there‚Äôs nothing I can do about it.

name: Jeremy Jones
text: This place is always good no matter what I get. I especially like the Tuesday lunch special a Small one toping pizza for only 5 bucks you cannot beat it.

name: Caitlin Smith
text: Always enjoy Mellow Mushroom.  Food is great, servers are pleasant and restaurant is clean.  They also have a lovely outdoor seating area.

name: Peter Yacavone
text: Great pizza and great atmosphere. Staff are always friendly and always willing to go above and beyond. Great beer selection as well!

name: GamerDadof4
text: Place was great.  I got the Steak and Cheese Hoagie and I liked it.  One of my friends got a pizza and when you are ordering, if you think that it won't be enough pizza for you so you'll order the size up... Don't. It will be enough!

name: The Royal Genius
text: This place has kind if a hippie nostalgia feeling along with a modernized touch, which is very interesting for a pizza place (interesting in a good way). Even though I had an appetizer there it was really good, which makes me want to go ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeff H
text: We have been here before and had a great time.  This time was just weird.  There was a 30 minute wait but we could see many open tables.  When seated we must have passed 10 open tables.  We ordered an appetizer and 10 minutes later told ‚Ä¶More

name: Joanne Corrado
text: Take my Grandaughters and the staff are so patient and friendly.  They love the childrens Mack n Cheese!  We Love The Pizza and Meatball Subs.  Yummy!!

name: Laura Simmons
text: This is the second time I have ordered pizza to go and have gotten home and is the complete wrong order. I guess I need to open up my pizzas each time I leave from there. First time understandable second time definitely a lack of focus. Don‚Äôt know if I will ever go back

name: mike bragg
text: Food was great, fresh and hot!!!!

name: SC Vick
text: Cute decor doesn't make up for bad food.  Cheese steak Hogue was downright terrible.  Dry, crispy steak made for bad dining experience.  Supposed to come with chips or upgrade to another side.  No other sides and we had to ask for chips.  Blah

name: Bryan Corbett
text: Solid pie here. Great place to take the family as well. The manager is a gentlemen and very friendly. Parker at the front desk helped me out with a few silly menu questions and was awesome! Very good employee. Tough to find good workers these days!

name: William Lari
text: Seriously some awesome pizza. Like....WOW. and great beer selection. This is the perfect pizza joint. Also, I don't know what they do to their crust...but wow. So good. I would eat their crust all day. Delicious. Buffalo chicken pizza and the BBQ chicken pizza are super awesome. Your welcome.

name: Scott Toal
text: Mellow Mushroom pizza crust is some of the best tasting bread you can get anywhere. It's like they put some magical mushroom goodness in it, which turns it into bread candy for the pizza to be built on. If they made a pie big enough I would ‚Ä¶More

name: Kathy Kearce Jones
text: Despite visiting on a not busy at all Sunday, we managed to have a horrible meal. Our food not only took forever, but was lukewarm at best. The three kids meals we ordered did not come with the other pizzas, but the server failed to even ‚Ä¶More

name: Remember me
text: Jayland was a GREAT server!! He had great positive energy and consistently checked on us! The food was GREAT!! The price was well worth it!!

name: Daniel Fieldstone
text: You really cannot go wrong with mellow mushroom.

name: Andrew Patteson
text: Good service, good beer, good pizza. Burger was poorly overcooked, some of the condiments were gross. Overall I like the laid back vibe, just wish a few more things were quality consistent. It is a chain after all, though. Family friendly is good.

name: M Vall
text: Awesome place to take the kiddos, good food, great atmosphere.

name: Raspberry Girrrl
text: Great atmosphere and all kinds of specialty pizzas.

name: Jakelin Garces
text: I love this restaurant the food is delicious and the employees are very kind....

name: James Ross
text: Great place people and food

name: Kristina Villella
text: The pizza tastes like a step above national chain pizza. Not terrible but not really good. I ordered a salad-lots of lettuce and not much else. The tables have large touchscreens that help to keep the kiddos busy while they wait for the ‚Ä¶More

name: Davos Rhine
text: Picked up three to go pizzas for my daughter‚Äôs birthday party last night and the bottoms or completely hard and burned. Definitely not what I am used to from mellow mushroom.

name: Susana F
text: Ordered pizza tonight for my kids and it was burned on the bottom

name: Dhiren Bhatt
text: Big place in posh locality but service and approach could have been more refined. The thing which matters the most for any restaurant i.e. food was great. Good selection of vegetation items.

name: Taylor Adams
text: The crust is really what sells this place. I like the kosmic karma pizza, but you can't go wrong with a pepperoni or supreme. The pizza isn't super greasy either. Even though it is a chain I think the pizza is worth it.

name: John Lee
text: Price good but food needs more seasoning. Also I had to ask for lemon for my water 3 times. Wasnt even really busy.

name: Mark Ford
text: Monica was an amazing server and the food was delicious as always.

name: Lauren Alina
text: Me and my friends went last night and we got there kinda late but our sever Eve was very genuine kind and ready to help us thanks Eve and all the kitchen staff and managers üòä you guys are great

name: JoLea
text: Very cool decor and atmosphere. Yummy pizza and subs. Pizza a little pricey, but worth it! Tables had built in screens with the menu (and possibly games, I didnt really look at it) which was neat.

name: Joan Graveman
text: Usually I don‚Äôt ever post reviews but...last night went to Mellow Mushroom and had one of the tastiest bites of food since moving to Charlotte. I ordered the Thai Dyed pizza - curried chicken, Thai chili sauce, garlic/olive oil base with ‚Ä¶More

name: Paula Birindelli
text: Not as good as on previous visits. Service okay, order was right, beverages refilled. No "extra", no friendly banter with the wait staff, just "meh".

name: Brad Mattson
text: Best crust in Charlotte.   Good beer selection and one of the few places you can get a pitcher.

name: Shelly Jain
text: It seemed like the wings I got today were prepared days in advance, reheated and served to me. They smelled and tasted stale. On a previous occasion, the veggie pizza had raw and uncooked tomatoes, onions and peppers thrown on a precooked pizza. It was like eating a salad spread on a pizza bread.  Never getting food here again.

name: Gregory Barrett
text: This is one of our two favorite pizza places and they have extensive beer menu. The pretzel bites disappear at our table in mere minutes. The multimedia tables by the bar have a giant touch screen that can be split into to screens so the kids can watch videos and play games.

name: Maria R-B
text: It was ok. Pizza and beer, really just average (and a bit pricey).

name: Barbara Mintz
text: Fun place for families, date night, and small groups.  It's mainly known for their varieties of pizza, including a gluten free pizza, as well as a kids menu, fun appetizers, and burgers.  There is a full bar that also carries cider on tap. ‚Ä¶More

name: William Lari
text: I absolutely love the flavor of the crust here. Great atmosphere, been when it's not that busy. The pizza is seriously amazing, I love the buffalo chicken pizza and the BBQ chicken. I am always excited to get a pizza from here, and don't be afraid to get a pizza for carryout if you want to pig out at home

name: scs.classics
text: Cold Food delivery from Door dash .

name: Oles Grinchak
text: Very cool and interesting place to go to. Great pizzas and plenty of other choices for those that love something else.

name: Crystal Maisel
text: By far the best pizza place in Charlotte. Everything is handmade to order, with fresh ingredients, and the crust is mouth-watering. Inside is decorated as a nod to the name, with large mushrooms in vibrant colors decorating the seating ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachrose fox
text: Server was awesome, had great recommendations

name: M.A Morales
text: Service was great ! Our waiter was attentive. The food was delicious! No complaints.

name: The Little Adventures
text: Price wasnt what I expected a little pricey. Staff was exceptionally helpful and friendly. Very lively hipsteresque vibe.

name: Mike S
text: Brian was amazing!  He coordinated a large order for 50 people and delivered it on short notice.  Everything was great!  Thank you Soo much!

name: Chuck Pearsall
text: Very good Southern pizza.  Not exactly New York but I like it better.  Lots of other choices.

name: Jill Mcgill
text: Pizza completely charred on the bottom

name: Tj Giles
text: Very good pizza and beer, but more expensive than most pizza places.

name: Izi Blumer
text: Service was great. Pizza was yummy. Was expecting more decor like the Asheville location but that didn't really take away from my experience.

name: Cathy Oldaker
text: Best pizza. And their Spinach Artichoke dip was yummy.

name: John Perez
text: Great place and food

name: Dawn D
text: The stars are for the food.  The service sucked! No change given back. Granted it was not a lot.  But come on. They seriously need to improve their lunchtime service.

name: Tammy Shah
text: I like the thin crust pizza here, because the normal crust is too thick for my liking. For some reason I think they have the best tasting cheese I have ever had on pizza. The sauce is okay. I will still be keeping this place in my lineup.

name: Brenda O'Malley
text: My nephew had his 5th birthday party at the mellow mushroom. It was about 16 family members in attendance including 3 chlildren 5 yrs old and younger.  The staff took care of all our needs. Our waitress was fantastic!  Everyone was wonderful. The atmosphere was GREAT for a child's birthday party.  Or any age birthday party.

name: Andrea Blosser
text: We've ordered to go, ate in, and have ordered through Postmates at this location multiple times and have constantly had our orders wrong. One time we ordered to go, showed up 45 minutes after ordering, our order was wrong, they remade it, ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Glazar
text: Food was very good. Our server didnt know the menu, the specials, and couldn't deal with separate checks though.

name: Karmen DiProjetto
text: I would give it 5 stars except a giant waitress in an suv almost plowed me and my child off the road becuase she was late to work. Luckily for her I was going to pick up a Togo order and got to cuss her out in front of everyone.

name: Dawn
text: When the pizza is good it‚Äôs good, but they are so inconsistent.

name: Vishal Desai
text: One of my fav pizza place. Really good food. Nice ambience. And most staff is courteous

name: Michelle B
text: Similar to another reviewer, our experience at this location last night was like nothing I have ever experienced. I placed our carry out order at 5:58pm and was told that it would be 30 minutes. We arrived at 6:30 and one of the pizzas we ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason
text: Really not impressed with the dough, very thick, chewy. Sauce is meh, taste is ok. Better than dominoes but to me it's more of a hipster/desinger style pizza. there are much better pizza places in Ballantyne for nj/NY/pa style pizza

name: Robin Hyatt
text: Great atmosphere and delicious food!

name: Lizzie playz„Ç∑
text: Nice restaurant and descent prices.Calzones were huge,enough for 2 ppl

name: Matt Wilson
text: Awesome pizza and ingredients are quality! Slightly higher prices but definitely worth it. Cool atmosphere too!

name: Kelly W
text: Love the pizza and pretzel bites with beer cheese.

name: Alyssa Nault
text: Got the build your own salad with tempeh and mushroom trio- delicious! üòã loved it so much, went for dinner to a different location ( bc was closer to airport) and ordered same thing!

name: Bessie Phillips
text: Great place to drop in to eat. They really take extra care when you tell them you have allergies. Will definitely come back again and again!

name: Wali Najeeb
text: Great food, very long wait though

name: karen bradley
text: Good food & gr8 service

name: Amy Sarson
text: Lunch was great. Had the bruschetta appetizer and Kosmic Karma pizza. Delicious!

name: Kina Dotson
text: Very friendly staff, great food

name: Robert Bailey
text: As always right on point great salt pretzels only problem is they don't give you enough of that awesome cheese sauce! Peparoini pizza was great as usual. If you have not been get there and if you have go back. Great selection of draft beers!

name: Nina Thompson
text:
The best Calzone I've put in my mouth!!Chicken,mushroom and loaded with some of the finest cheeses.will keep u coming back for more.awesome !
Friendly ,very clean restrooms.i will be back my next trip to N.C.

name: Pork Mustard
text: We arrived around 7:30 PM and the waitress took our order around 7:45 PM.  We ordered an appetizer and two pizzas.  Around 8:30 PM, nothing.  The manager noticed us and came over to greet us.  We told him we've been waiting for some time ‚Ä¶More

name: Deanna Morton
text: Great Mellow Mushroom location. Was very pleased with decor, location, service and food. :)

name: Alireza Keyanjam
text: Nice environment, good selection of beers.  But all the food items we ordered where unacceptable. Kids menu was horrible. Pizza was pale and tasteless.

name: Wes Campbell
text: Food was completely cold and beyond salty

name: Arundhiti Pawar
text: Lover the ambience, food and service!

name: Mike Dutiel
text: Can't go wrong with Magical mystery tour

name: Samantha Smoak
text: Place was absolutely amazing.  Zoey was wonderful server! And the food was soooooooo good

name: Jugghead McKinzie
text: Food is good. Their crust is delicious actually, but service has always been hit or miss. Don't go with a large group.

name: Alistair Oliver-Paull
text: Good food and good service.

name: Deron Jones
text: There Pizza and wings are Good.  Nice Drinks

name: David Kohler
text: Very good.....excellent staff and friendly environment....MGMT came over twice to make sure our experience was good....2nd. time there.....I highly recommend.

name: cody powell
text: Great food.  Service is a little slow.  Clean restaurant

name: WALLY MARK
text: I would've given it 5 stars. The pizza is out of this word, however to our bad luck we were were seated next to the bar and the bartender was assigned to serve us... No need to elaborate!
